name: Ritesh Ranjan
summary: Experienced full stack developer with 10 years in web development, working with multiple startups and MNCs.
Passionate about programming, web and software development since school days.
Proficient in system design & software architectures, with a track record of successfully delivering multiple high-performing software solutions.

keyAchievements.title: System Design

keyAchievements.desc: Worked with multiple startups in their early days & launched their first product.

keyAchievements.title: Scaled App to 1M+ Users
